participant_1.background:
I have never been in a fight, but I would defend myself if I had to.
my mother was a piano teacher.
I was a stay-at-home mom when my kids were little.
i am a girl who loves sports cars and video games.
I took my cats to the farm and let them play with the pigs, horses and hens.

I'm a great cook, and my friends would love to try my recipes.
I am a hard worker, and I don't let my height get in the way of my work.
I went to the beach with my family and we had a blast!
I come from a small town in the Midwest, where I grew up fishing and learning about animals.
i have a big beard.

content.text: I'm great! Just hanging out, playing video games and watching TV.
That sounds fun! I'm currently working on a recipe for a new dessert I'm trying to create.
Oh nice! I love cooking! What kind of dessert is it?
It's a chocolate cake with a chocolate ganache frosting. I'm trying to figure out how to make the frosting more fluffy.
That sounds delicious! I love chocolate.
Thanks! I'm excited to try it out. I'm also thinking of making some chocolate chip cookies to go with it.
Oh my gosh, that sounds amazing! I love chocolate chip cookies!
Me too! They're my favorite kind of cookie.
I think we should have a bake off! We can each make our favorite dessert and then compare them.
That would be so much fun! I'd love to do that!
Great! We can set it up for next weekend.
